import React from 'react' import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import "../CSS/Cart.css" function Cart() { const cart = useSelector((state)=>state.cart); return (

Shpping Cart

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart Empty

Start Shopping
):(<>

Product

Price

Quantity

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map((cartItem )=>(
{cartItem.name} {cartItem.price}
))}
Total
)}
) } export default Cart
